metadata.name: RunDLL32 Spawning Explorer
metadata.comment: Detects RunDLL32.exe spawning explorer.exe as child, which is very uncommon, often observes Gamarue spawning the explorer.exe process in an unusual way

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\rundll32.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\explorer.exe')) AND NOT contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\shell32.dll,control_rundll')))

output.summary: Detects RunDLL32.exe spawning explorer.exe as child, which is very uncommon, often observes Gamarue spawning the explorer.exe process in an unusual way
